IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENHANCE TRAUMA, CARDIAC, STROKE CARE, DISASTER PREPAREDENESS IN THE CONCHO VALLEY
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE CONCHO VALLEY REGIONAL ADVISORY COUNCIL TSA-K, WHICH REPRESENTS THE TRAUMA SERVICE AREA-K, IS A GEOGRAPHIC AREA AS DEFINED BY THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF STATE HEALTH SERVICES. THE CONCHO VALLEY REGIONAL ADVISORY COUNCIL IS COMPRISED OF LOCAL CITIZENS WHO REPRESENT HOSPITALS, PRE-HOSPITAL PROVIDERS, PHYSICIANS, NURSES AND OTHER INDIVIDUALS INTERESTED IN TRAUMA CARE, INJURY PREVENTION, CARDIAC CARE, STROKE CARE, AND DISASTER PREPAREDNESS WITHIN THE TRAUMA SERVICE AREA.COUNTIES SERVED: COKE, CONCHO, CROCKETT, IRION, KIMBLE, MASON, MCCULLOCH, MENARD, REAGAN, RUNNELS, SCHLEICHER, STERLING, SUTTON, AND TOM GREEN.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES TRAINING AND EDUCATION TO AREA EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICE ORGANIZATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION APPROVES GRANT FUNDS BASED ON AN APPLICATION PROCESS. ALL GRANTEES ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR FULFILLING THE GRANT REQUIREMENTS, INCLUDING PROVIDING DOCUMENTATION AND RECEIPTS TO THE ORGANIZATION FOR ALL TRAUMA EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES PURCHASED WITH GRANT FUNDS. SB 8 THRU DECEMBER 2024 (GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS): THE ORGANIZATION KEEPS RECORDS FOR EACH STUDENT. THEY REPORT QUARTERLY TO DSHS AND SHARE THEIR FINANCIALS EACH MONTH AT A GENERAL MEMBERSHIP MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AT A BOARD MEETING. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS VOTE TO APPROVE THE FORM 990 BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, THEN APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE APPROVED BY THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF STATE HEALTH SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

SUPPLIES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 0. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 3,966. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 3,966. COPIER EXPENSE: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 0. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 2,405. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 2,405. POSTAGE: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 0. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 620. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 620. GRANTS MISCELLANEOUS EXPENSES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 400. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 0. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 400.
